docs.title: Treasury
docs.text: Welcome to Treasury - Enterprise AI Solutions for the Oil & Gas Industry.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Treasury provides cutting-edge AI capabilities tailored specifically for the energy sector, enabling organizations to optimize operations, reduce costs, and drive innovation.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• Predictive Analytics - Forecast production, detect anomalies, and optimize asset performance
  • Document Intelligence - Extract insights from technical documents, reports, and regulatory filings
  • Operational Optimization - Streamline workflows and reduce downtime through intelligent automation

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text: Get started with Treasury by following our Getting Started Guide.

docs.title: About Treasury
docs.text: Treasury is an enterprise AI platform designed specifically for the oil and gas industry.

docs.title: Mission
docs.text: Empowering energy companies with intelligent solutions that drive operational excellence and sustainable growth.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text: For inquiries, please reach out to the Treasury team.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository
  2. Create a virtual environment: 
    python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows: venv\Scripts\activate
  3. Install dependencies: 
    pip install -r requirements.txt
  4. Configure your environment variables in .env

docs.title: Building for Production
docs.text:
mkdocs build

The static site will be generated in the site/ directory.
